comments:
I20050823-0800

The image of the third line in the failure trace table is missing when running
this test:

import junit.framework.TestCase;

public class LongTraceLines extends TestCase {
	public void testLongTraceLine() throws Exception {
		String errorString = "\nNumbers:";
		for (int i = 0; i < 0; i++) {
			errorString += " " + i;
		}
		throw new RuntimeException(errorString);
	}
}

The test didn't fail on Andre's 10.4 machine, but fails on the eclipse.org test
machine (10.3.9).

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: expected:<Image {376342240}> but was:<null>
at

Hm, the test only failed in I20050823-0800 and N20050825-0010.
It passed in all earlier nightly builds back to N20050822-0010.

So, it seems to be an intermittent failure. I'm investigating.

I added the failure trace as assertion message. That should show whether the
trace has correctly been received.

The only other source of error I can currently think of is some asynchronity in
TableItems. In FailureTableDisplay#addTraceLine(..), we first create a TableItem
and later set the image. If one of these operations needs the event loop to
complete, then we could observe a TableItem whose image has not been set yet.
But AFAIK, readAndDispatch() should not be necessary here.
Closing, since the failure has not occurred any more after N20050825-0010.
